description: UMD 3.14.7 is a revision update of the third Major release of UMD. In particular, it contains an update for umd-release for SL6.
releaseNotes: This release contains a fix for umd-release for SL6, which solves an issue with GPG keys, both in case of new installations and updates.
installationNotes: All products in UMD 3.14.7 were verified against EGI's current Quality Criteria. Installation and configuration notes are available in the EGI repository.
contact: For further information about the distribution, its goals and surrounding processes, and more information about how to engage as a Technology Provider with EGI, please send an Email to: cto (at) egi.eu.
technicalContact: For any bugs and issues you encounter that are not described in the release notes of this release, or the related documentation provided by the Technology Providers, please visit the EGI Helpdesk (https://ggus.eu/) to make a report.
knownIssues: Please visit https://wiki.egi.eu/wiki/UMD-3:UMD-3.14.7 for known issues.
changeLog: This release includes umd-release 3.14.4-1 for SL6.

products.name: umd.umd-release
products.description: umd repository configuration that adds all missing repositories that are needed for the installation of UMD products and configures yum priorities
